snippet: A former Nigerian state governor was jailed for five years on Monday after being found guilty of corruption related to procurement of cars while in office, a judge said....

headline.main: Former Nigerian Governor Jailed for Five Years for Corruption
headline.print_headline: Former Nigerian Governor Jailed for Five Years for Corruption

lead_paragraph: A former Nigerian state governor was jailed for five years on Monday after being found guilty of corruption related to procurement of cars while in office, a judge said.
